name: Shallow Swing
description: Are you ok Bubbles? You look a bit like... shrinking?! You like to travel, but it is a rough world out there. Take a deep breath and try to reach the next exit.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB graphics memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
